plot: One evening, a shopkeeper has a visit from a strange traveler who sells him a extraordinary map: a universal map that is able to change with his travels.
title: Terra incognita
plot_es: One evening, a shopkeeper has a visit from a strange traveler who sells him a extraordinary map: a universal map that is able to change with his travels.
plot_en: One evening, a shopkeeper has a visit from a strange traveler who sells him a extraordinary map: a universal map that is able to change with his travels.
